# Please check the items below before submitting your PR

- [ ] I have read and understood the [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/billz/raspap-awesome/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
- [ ] This pull request has a descriptive title (for example, "Added Travelplex to Projects")

The resource I added:
- [ ] includes a valid (https) link,
- [ ] includes a concise and on-topic description,
- [ ] mentions if there is only support on some devices,
- [ ] is not a duplicate,
- [ ] is in the correct alphabetical order for its section,
- [ ] follows the form `[Named Link](URL) - Description`
